entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:11 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 10:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain in the evening then to rain before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
